Name: graph_rag_tuning
Title: Fine-tuning Tiny LLMs with Knowledge Graph-Enhanced RAG for HR Policy QA
Experiment: Integrate a Knowledge Graph into the RAG pipeline and fine-tune a tiny LLM on HR policy documents. Assess the improvement in retrieval accuracy and response quality over standard RAG approaches.

Name: multi_hop_reasoning
Title: Enhancing Multi-hop Reasoning in Tiny LLMs with Graph-Based Retrieval
Experiment: Test the impact of incorporating graph-based retrieval methods on multi-hop reasoning tasks in QA using tiny LLMs. Compare the performance with traditional retrieval methods.

Name: synthetic_augmentation
Title: Improving Tiny LLM QA Through Synthetic Data Augmentation and Summarization
Experiment: Generate synthetic HR policy data for augmentation, then fine-tune a tiny LLM. Evaluate the impact on QA accuracy and efficiency, particularly in domain-specific queries.
